001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.NotificationEnum;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.NotificationMessage;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.AlarmStatusRequest;
011
012import java.math.BigInteger;
013import java.util.HashSet;
014import java.util.Set;
015import java.util.TreeSet;
016
017/**
018 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.AlarmStatusRequest}, opCode 71, size 8
019 *
020 * <br>
021 *
022 * 
023 * <table border='1'>
024 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
025 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>71</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
026 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>8</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
027 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#RESPONSE}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
028 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.AlarmStatusRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
029 * </table>
030 */
031@MessageProps(
032        opCode=71,
033        size=8,
034        type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
035        request= AlarmStatusRequest.class
036)
037public class AlarmStatusResponse extends NotificationMessage {
038    private BigInteger intMap;
039
040    // private val unused, but placed to force java tostring to include the formatted alerts set
041    private Set<AlarmResponseType> alarms;
042
043    public AlarmStatusResponse() {}
044
045    public AlarmStatusResponse(BigInteger intMap) {
046        this.cargo = buildCargo(intMap);
047        parse(cargo);
048    }
049
050    public AlarmStatusResponse(AlarmResponseType... alarms) {
051        this.cargo = buildCargo(AlarmResponseType.toBitmask(alarms));
052        parse(cargo);
053    }
054
055    private static byte[] buildCargo(BigInteger byte0uint64) {
056        return Bytes.toUint64(byte0uint64.longValue());
057    }
058
059    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
060        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
061        intMap = Bytes.readUint64(raw, 0);
062        cargo = raw;
063        alarms = getAlarms();
064    }
065
066    public BigInteger getIntMap() {
067        return intMap;
068    }
069
070    @Override
071    public int size() {
072        return alarms==null ? 0 : alarms.size();
073    }
074
075    public enum AlarmResponseType implements NotificationEnum {
076        CARTRIDGE_ALARM(0, "There is an issue with the cartridge and it needs to be replaced."),
077        CARTRIDGE_ALARM2(1, "There is an issue with the cartridge and it needs to be replaced."),
078        OCCLUSION_ALARM(2, "An occlusion has occurred. Please check your pump site and tubing and restart insulin delivery."),
079        PUMP_RESET_ALARM(3, "The pump was reset. IOB has been reset to 0 and CGM may need to be re-activated."),
080        DEFAULT_ALARM_4(4),
081        CARTRIDGE_ALARM3(5, "There is an issue with the cartridge and it needs to be replaced."),
082        CARTRIDGE_ALARM4(6, "There is an issue with the cartridge and it needs to be replaced."),
083        AUTO_OFF_ALARM(7, "Pump will stop delivering insulin automatically soon because no user activity has occurred and the auto-off setting is enabled."),
084        EMPTY_CARTRIDGE_ALARM(8, "Cartridge is out of insulin and insulin delivery cannot occur. Please fill a new cartridge."),
085        CARTRIDGE_ALARM5(9, "There is an issue with the cartridge and it needs to be replaced."),
086        TEMPERATURE_ALARM(10, "Pump temperature is out of range and insulin cannot be safely delivered."),
087        TEMPERATURE_ALARM2(11, "Pump temperature is out of range and insulin cannot be safely delivered."),
088        BATTERY_SHUTDOWN_ALARM(12, "Pump battery level is critically low and the device will shut down. Please charge pump immediately."),
089        DEFAULT_ALARM_13(13),
090        INVALID_DATE_ALARM(14, "The pump's configured date is invalid."),
091        TEMPERATURE_ALARM3(15, "Pump temperature is out of range and insulin cannot be safely delivered."),
092        CARTRIDGE_ALARM6(16, "There is an issue with the cartridge and it needs to be replaced."),
093        DEFAULT_ALARM_17(17),
094        RESUME_PUMP_ALARM(18, "Insulin delivery is currently off. Please restart insulin delivery soon."),
095        DEFAULT_ALARM_19(19),
096        CARTRIDGE_ALARM7(20, "There is an issue with the cartridge and it needs to be replaced."),
097        ALTITUDE_ALARM(21, "Pump altitude is out of range and insulin cannot be safely delivered."),
098        STUCK_BUTTON_ALARM(22, "The pump button may be stuck or has been pressed for too long a period of time."),
099        RESUME_PUMP_ALARM2(23, "Insulin delivery is currently off. Please restart insulin delivery soon."),
100        ATMOSPHERIC_PRESSURE_OUT_OF_RANGE_ALARM(24, "Pump atmospheric pressure is out of range and insulin cannot be safely delivered."),
101        CARTRIDGE_REMOVED_ALARM(25, "The cartridge was removed from the pump. Please fill a new cartridge."),
102        OCCLUSION_ALARM2(26, "An occlusion has occurred. Please check your pump site and tubing and restart insulin delivery."),
103        DEFAULT_ALARM_27(27),
104        DEFAULT_ALARM_28(28),
105        CARTRIDGE_ALARM10(29, "There is an issue with the cartridge and it needs to be replaced."),
106        CARTRIDGE_ALARM11(30, "There is an issue with the cartridge and it needs to be replaced."),
107        CARTRIDGE_ALARM12(31, "There is an issue with the cartridge and it needs to be replaced."),

111        DEFAULT_ALARM_35(35),

134        DEFAULT_ALARM_58(58),
135        DEFAULT_ALARM_59(59),

139        DEFAULT_ALARM_63(63)
140
141        ;
142
143        private final int bitmask;
144        private final String description;
145        AlarmResponseType(int bitmask) {
146            this.bitmask = bitmask;
147            this.description = null;
148        }
149        AlarmResponseType(int bitmask, String description) {
150            this.bitmask = bitmask;
151            this.description = description;
152        }
153
154        public int bitmask() {
155            return bitmask;
156        }
157
158        public int getId() {
159            return bitmask;
160        }
161        public String getDescription() {
162            return description;
163        }
164
165        public boolean isKnownAlarm() {
166            return description != null && !description.isBlank();
167        }
168
169        public static BigInteger toBitmask(AlarmResponseType ...types) {
170            BigInteger ret = BigInteger.ZERO;
171            for (AlarmResponseType type : types) {
172                ret = ret.setBit(type.bitmask());
173            }
174
175            return ret;
176        }
177
178        public static Set<AlarmResponseType> fromBitmask(BigInteger intMap) {
179            Set<AlarmResponseType> current = new TreeSet<>();
180            for (AlarmResponseType type : AlarmResponseType.values()) {
181                if (intMap.testBit(type.bitmask())) {
182                    current.add(type);
183                }
184            }
185
186            return current;
187        }
188
189        public static AlarmResponseType fromSingularId(long id) {
190            for (AlarmResponseType type : AlarmResponseType.values()) {
191                if (id == type.bitmask()) {
192                    return type;
193                }
194            }
195            return null;
196        }
197
198        public String toString() {
199            return name();
200        }
201    }
202
203    public Set<AlarmResponseType> getAlarms() {
204        return AlarmResponseType.fromBitmask(getIntMap());
205    }
206
207
208    @Override
209    public Set<Integer> notificationIds() {
210        Set<Integer> ids = new HashSet<>();
211
212        for (AlarmResponseType alert : getAlarms()) {
213            if (alert.isKnownAlarm()) {
214                ids.add(alert.getId());
215            }
216        }
217
218        return ids;
219    }
220}
